column4: i have a newly bought athlon 64 x2 and i installed ubuntu 7.10 64 version but iti seems like it full of glitches and my video card (NVIDIA) didn't had any problem in my older computer to run compiz. Should i install the normal version of ubuntu
i can say, standard ubuntu works fine on amd x2, even with SLI, havent tried the 64 bit version here yet
So it would be better to install the normal one? great thx

64 bit is coming on fast, but not everything works perfect atm, still hard under developement, 32bit is stabile and runs perfectly, however you wont have the total profit of ur amd 64bit cpu (doesnt matter that much tho)
